items.title: Firm that called 2025 nearly perfectly — until a moment of doubt — now has highest S&P 500 target on Wall Street
items.description: Oppenheimer says the S&P 500 will push ahead in 2026, boosted by the economy and corporate profits that are likely to keep holding up.

items.title: My mother is selling my late father’s multimillion-dollar California real-estate portfolio — must I stand idly by?
